byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; DuPont stock rises 4.6 percent, to $74.81, after Institutional Shareholder Services expresses support for bid by activist investor Nelson Peltz to gain seats on DuPont board.
lead_paragraph: The backing of I.S.S. is a big win for Mr. Peltz and his Trian Fund Management as they engage in a bitter fight over the board of the chemical company.

headline.main: DuPont Shares Rise After Proxy Adviser Backs Nelson Peltz

snippet: The backing of I.S.S. is a big win for Mr. Peltz and his Trian Fund Management as they engage in a bitter fight over the board of the chemical company.
